website_summaries.verdict: A lower-cost poolside basketball set that is smaller than you might expect, yet for many pool owners, it fills the need perfectly.
pros: Has a wide backboard and a base that can be filled with water or sand for stability
Rim is plastic, so it resists rust
cons: Owners note some durability concerns regarding the net

customer_reviews.title: Smaller size, but good for the pool.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be much bigger, but my kids and my husband love it for the pool. It doesn't take up much space and has been easy to clean and it is sturdy. See photo attached.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. R

customer_reviews.title: Great product with some modifications
customer_reviews.text: I have made some adjustments to this product and it seems to work better. I filled the arm with great stuff foam to give it more rigidity as the first one failed half way through the swim season. I also used caulk to "cement" the arm to the base and put the same on the pin that holds it all together. It is used in the shallow end for kids in our neighborhood pool. Not sure why the little kids like pulling out the pin that holds it together so much. With the changes it has held up well all summer. Should be usable again next summer. Without the changes the first one failed half way through the pool season.
customer_reviews.author: D.K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product but the net does not stand up through ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the net does not stand up through a Florida summer. I bought this for a late June birthday and by August the net was totally faded and gone. I bring in this product nightly under pool cover or when not in use. Just disappointed in the net. SwimWays needs to offer a replacement with the initial buy because they do not know where the product will be in use...or have a clarification for warm weather climates.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not as stable as we hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Very shaky. We were replacing an old one that the metal hoop had rusted out. It was considerable smaller than the other one we had. If you have small children this may be ok. My hubby and kids didn't like the quality and size. We are returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Emelgee

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: awesome, used whole summer, kids slammed on it, it did not break. it did not fade. it did not fall over in very high winds. highly suggest. i am posting this now in December after end of summer.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: We do like this and play with it. However, it does not lock into place like it is supposed to. I contacted the company and they were to send another part to fix but never did. I tried to reach out again and never got a reply. We made do and rigged it up to work. But the company is terrible to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a great hoop for the pool
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a great hoop for the pool... Unfortunately the rim broke as it is simple plastic. I cannot find replacement parts and customer service seems to be non-existent; I found a web page for them and have submitted two requests and have heard nothing back. For the money I was expecting more. spend $30 more and get a better setup.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing plug for the base to cap off the hole where you put the water in. Also missing screws to attach/secure the backboard to the post extending up from the base. Will require a trip to the hardware store. Also came with a volleyball net which is of no use since the package was ordered as a single poolside basketball goal. Would rather of had the screws and cap instead of a volleyball net. Sturdiness sucks without the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY- LEAKER
customer_reviews.text: Filled the base up with water and automatically it started leaking immediately. Thought it might have something to do with the gasket in the opening, but no. Slowly it has started to crack and leaks more and more. There is really nothing to fix it at this point. We have only had it about 4 weeks. Not worth the money at all, very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Siekiera

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Assemble requires no tools but was difficult to lock parts in place. Required multiple people to get it to snap together. The net is very cheaply made and the rim constantly comes off or sits lopsided. Had I have known, I would have spent a little more money on something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fun but post is too loose.
customer_reviews.text: This poolside basketball goal is very fun with the exception of the net stand not staying straight! We have to get creative & place lawn chairs on each side to hold it straight but we have to keep going over to straighten it continuously. The pole that goes in the stand needs to be more secure because that's going to get old very fast!
customer_reviews.author: mjbash

customer_reviews.title: Simple to set up. The post and backboard tend ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set up. The post and backboard tend to swivel when the ball hits the backboard. Just shim the post where it meets the base and it will keep the board from moving.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sotny

customer_reviews.title: Too easily breakable
customer_reviews.text: Breaks to easily with a13 year old and his father playing in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this product. For the money I expected something that was better than a Little Tykes baby goal. Flimsy and falls in the pool often when ball goes through the basket. I have already gotten another one around the same price that is way better. Definitely would not buy this one if you have older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Oquinn

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I thought
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a few weeks, then the plastic pole just broke.....
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Unsteady
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy. The hoop stand swivels. Would not buy or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But pool enjoyment ever
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I got for the kids to play with in the pool. The only thing I wish it came with more then one ball. We looked all over for balls small enough to fit it we finally did. The kids had a blast...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have played with this all summer and love it. This goal has taken a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: We have played with this all summer and love it. This goal has taken a lot of abuse and still holding up
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Summer Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed this all summer - easy to assemble, though sometimes my boys hang on the rim and it is not sturdy enough for that - the plastic bends.... Overall, great! and what we expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice hoop set
customer_reviews.text: Nice hoop set but I wish the hoop arm was a little sturdier. Other than that it is great
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it but nothing to stop the hoop from spinning around.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable!!! Great product for my 12yo son and his buddies! This was shipped fast and set up very easy. It's on our second season of non-stop pool basketball. Takes some serious abuse and keeps on working. Highly recommend this for active boys.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey P Winn

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: bought for my 9 year old grandson as he loves basketball and thought it would be alot of fun for the pool. Had out of town company and they played everyday for a hour or more. Still having alot of fun with it by the pool. Had done some compare shopping previous to purchasing this item. This item was 50 dollars more if purchased at a pool supply store! The whole family is having fun with this was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: John Lepiaka

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Hoop base is flimsy and wobbles. Not worth the $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, just wish the net pole wouldn't twist so easily
customer_reviews.author: D. Raab

customer_reviews.title: Product is okay, it's a bit flimsy, I ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay, it's a bit flimsy, I had to wedge hard plastic on the base so that every time the ball hits the back board it would not move. Overall it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: dazednfl

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons played daily with this pool net. They preferred this basketball net to the floating nets.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Tanger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was very delighted to get this for his birthday
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great fun & quality
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this. Easy to assemble. The price is great. 15, 12, and 9 year olds. We use in an in ground pool.
customer_reviews.author: Your Bacon my hart

customer_reviews.title: but everyone who gets in the pool seems to love to play with it
customer_reviews.text: The basketball is a little large for the net, but everyone who gets in the pool seems to love to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: JanieDress

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The support itself could be more sturdy. Moves side to side easily every shot.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Missing the rim!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's birthday. He was so excited and we put it together, however it is missing the rim!!!! Nice way to spoil his Birthday!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Works good if you put a little extra work into it
customer_reviews.text: Tips over and twists too easily. You just have to rig it up yourself with whatever you have around and you'll have fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: jaamzw

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this, use by our pool. Great fun for summer pool fun.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita ThomasTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This item came defective missing holes and is not sturdy. A total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: pool toy  by swimway
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's turned 6 "TWINS" so for there birthday my wife and I sent them the poolside basketball game set. THEY LOVED IT !!!!!! By the end of the day my son was wore out playing with his sons. GREAT GAME SET !!!!!!! D L Rupert
customer_reviews.author: Douglas L. Rupert Sr.

customer_reviews.title: My kids just love this, but the base is really cheap and ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids just love this, but the base is really cheap and it falls into the pool way too often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the pool!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered very fast. Easy to put together. And the kids absolutely love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime A

customer_reviews.title: Basket pole is too light and weak for dunking and ...
customer_reviews.text: Basket pole is too light and weak for dunking and such. Construction of the product warranted a two star.
customer_reviews.author: John Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works good for my purposes. It's all plastic so no worries with rust or rot but plastic has alot of flex. Very forgiving though.
customer_reviews.author: K. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: saved my summer. The kids are non-stop playing with this in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Raffi

customer_reviews.title: Shooting hoops
customer_reviews.text: good quality it seems like it will last a while even if the 8 yr old slam dunks the whole thing in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: CEK

customer_reviews.title: Kids and adults loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Kids and adults loved it!! Used the allen wrench to "secure" the rim so it wouldn't bend. Looked small when we were setting up but when poolside it was perfect. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: The kids love this but the post is loose in the base ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this but the post is loose in the base causing it to spin from side to side. We stuffed some cardboard in around the post which seems to have worked for now but wet cardboard is doomed to fail. Eventually we'll have to figure something else out.
customer_reviews.author: HaleyMD

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy, we don't use it. The hoop moves around and isn't stationary.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: pool basketball set.
customer_reviews.text: We love to play this game in the pool, because the set is sturdy and stable which is a plus to play baskets. thanks
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it, nicer than i thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Dimerling

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: one year and fell apart net is ripped hole in bottom
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy, cheap made. Had to modify it to stabilize it
customer_reviews.author: Bill Guyther

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great. Fun. Good price. Only negative is that sometimes when ball hits hoop it spins a bit.
customer_reviews.author: A.s.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. But it rotates when it gets hit with a ball. Kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P Allen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pour quality for the money and the base leaks, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis E Siegrist

customer_reviews.title: I had a bunch of 22-year-old boys who had a great time playing basketball all summer
customer_reviews.text: This basketball net worked out really well for my pool. I live close to the ocean and other basketball nets rusted after one season. Because this doesn't have any metal parts to it I didn't have to worry about rust. I had a bunch of 22-year-old boys who had a great time playing basketball all summer!
customer_reviews.author: Daisydoots

customer_reviews.title: very small
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a nice product but alot smaller than expected.. will probaly return. def for a smaller pool
customer_reviews.author: Denise S

customer_reviews.title: Great poolside hoop
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandson got this for his birthday and loves he. We all had a great time last summer playing ball with this hoop. It seems sturdy and able for 10 year olds, and us adults to have a great time with at the edge of the pool. Recommend this hoop.
customer_reviews.author: daisey

customer_reviews.title: It is good for what it is - a pool basketball hoop
customer_reviews.text: It is good for what it is - a pool basketball hoop. Backboard is hollow plastic so the rebound/bounce is a dull thud. My last one was like that and I tried to get away from that engineering, but oh well. What is worse is that the post rotates when you hit the board off center. I just put some shim sticks in at the base and so far that has stopped the spin. All in all, it is good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DBend

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it to be a little taller. It does stay put, which I like. It's good for my daughter, who is short, but the other children have no use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Survived the teenagers
customer_reviews.text: My kids love playing basketball in the pool. This basketball hoop has survived a full summer of teenagers dunking on it. It is very sturdy and will certainly be used next summer.
customer_reviews.author: grizel c. ferro

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.text: The upright post that holds the backboard wobbles side to side so the backboard and goal will not set straight. Really disappointed in the quality of this product. I am going to have to figure out a way to jerry rig it so it can be used.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie V.

customer_reviews.title: It has been great. The first one lasted about 6 years
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one for my condo pool. It has been great. The first one lasted about 6 years. My net shredded on my last one after 4 years... I called to get a new net because I could not find one online. They sent me out two for free. Update, my ball wasn't holding air on the new one, and I called them and they sent me a replacement within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: great little pool basketball hoop  "BUT"
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pool basketball hoop . The ball is made just like the real basketballs, "not made of beach ball material". The only problem is where the backboard pole goes into the base it's not super tight, and will swivel when you hit the sides of the backboard. FIX- use a tube of superglue on it after you assemble it. Problem Solved....
customer_reviews.author: stephen d travioli

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made for the price
customer_reviews.text: not impressed. this thing should've cost $20. very cheaply made thin plastic. Expected something better for the price of $75.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: It is great. I wasn't sure with the price if it was going to be good...It was GREAT!! Thank YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cheap not worth the money something I can get at toy r us
customer_reviews.author: Susan Carnevale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Good customer service for the product.
customer_reviews.author: lisa ramos

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing I could have bought for my Grandkids...They won't get out of the pool, they like it so much!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Russell

customer_reviews.title: rugs
customer_reviews.text: Large rug is nice. The runner is a little too thin. Price is right. You got to drop this with the required words.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Dillaman

product_meta.title: SwimWays Poolside Basketball
product_meta.description:
The SwimWays Poolside Basketball game is a heavy-duty swimming pool basketball game set. The extra large durable backboard and base with built-in ball rest provides maximum stability during game play. With quick and easy no-tools assembly, you'll be ready to play in no time. The Poolside Basketball game is great for keeping the kids active and cool on those hot summer days. Who knows? Mom or Dad might join in too - it's outdoor fun for the entire family! Pro-style basketball included. Ages 6 years and up.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Whether for sheer competition or your personal best, swim sports and poolside games are good, clean fun for the whole family. Watch your pool become a basketball court! Ball and hoop together offer friendly competition or use it just to improve your skills while in the pool.
feature_bullets: The sturdy base can be filled with water or sand to enhance stability
Prostyle basketball included plus built-in molded basketball rest
Quick and easy assembly - no tools required!
Heavy duty basketball hoop stands 24" high with a 2225" wide backboard that's fun for the whole family!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars147 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
